translation.en: I wanted nothing more than my mother's happiness.
translation.es: mi mayor deseo era ver feliz a mi madre.

translation.en: For what kind of man would I be if I did not help my mother?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de hombre sería si no ayudaba a mi madre?

translation.en: If I did not save her?
Have you figured it out yet, fatso?
How many years since we took over the ranch
translation.es: ¿Cuánto hace que relevamos en la hacienda

translation.en: from the Old Gent and Old Lady?
translation.es: al Viejo y a la Vieja?

translation.en: You ever try the house bath, Phil?
translation.es: ¿Nunca usas la tina de la casa, Phil?

translation.en: Early up tomorrow, brother. Big old drive.
translation.es: Mañana salimos temprano, hermano. Es un arreo largo.

translation.en: There's a dead cow. Keep our cattle away.
translation.es: Hay una vaca muerta. Alejen el ganado.

translation.en: What's it? All right, fatso, I'll tell you what it is.
translation.es: ¿Qué cosa? Está bien, gordo, te diré qué cosa.

translation.en: Twenty- five years since our first run together.
Know what we should do? What's that?
Go camping again in the mountains and shoot ourselves some fresh elk liver.
translation.es: Acampar en las montañas otra vez y comer hígado de ciervo.

translation.en: Cook it right there on the coals like Bronco Henry taught us.
translation.es: Asarlo ahí mismo sobre las brasas, como nos enseñó Bronco Henry.

translation.en: You act like it pains you to hitch two words together.
translation.es: Parece que te costara decir dos palabras.

translation.en: Do you what they'd prefer to eat?
They like the fried chicken dinner.
I'm going to need your room.
- Do you like the mansion? - Too much to clean.
translation.es: - ¿Te gusta la mansión? - Demasiado para limpiar.

translation.en: You wouldn't have to clean it. There would be cleaners.
translation.es: No tendrías que limpiarla. Habría sirvientes.

translation.en: - I need three chickens. Can you do them? - All right.
translation.es: - Necesito tres pollos. ¿Te encargas? - De acuerdo.

translation.en: You're gonna have to move your stuff to the shed.
translation.es: Deberás llevar tus cosas al cobertizo.

translation.en: I'll make a bed for you on the floor.
translation.es: Te prepararé una cama en el piso.

translation.en: Well, we can't wait forever. The cattle are in the yards, so drink up.
translation.es: No seguiremos esperando. El ganado está en los corrales. Beban.

translation.en: I couldn't make the boys hold back forever.
Checked the power, and it's held up. Not coming till morning.
translation.es: Pregunté por el poder. Está demorado. Llega recién mañana.

translation.en: Oh, no, thanks. Phil, they're ready for us next door at the Red Mill.
translation.es: No, gracias. Phil, ya nos esperan en el Red Mill.

translation.en: Twenty- five years ago, where were you, Georgie Boy?
A chubby know- nothing too dumb to get through college.
translation.es: Eras un regordete inútil, muy tonto para ir a la universidad.

translation.en: One person in particular taught you and me ranching so we damn well succeeded.
translation.es: Una persona en particular nos enseñó a ser ganaderos, para que triunfáramos.

translation.en: So, to us brothers, Romulus and Remus, and the wolf who raised us.
translation.es: Por nosotros, los hermanos Rómulo y Remo, y por el lobo que nos crio.

translation.en: - Il Lupo. - Bronco. - Bronco Henry. - Bronco Henry.

translation.es: - Se va el jefe. - A cenar, muchachos.

translation.en: Rose? Rose, play piano for us please.  I can't!
translation.es: - ¿Rose? Rosie, toca el piano, por favor. - ¡No puedo!

translation.en: - Is everything all right? - Yes, ma'am. Fine.
translation.es: - ¿Está todo en orden? - Sí, señora. Bien.

translation.en: I've never seen a woman behind the wheel of a car.
translation.es: Jamás vi a una mujer al volante de un auto.

translation.en: I said, Have you never seen a lady drive a car before?
translation.es: Le pregunté: ¿Nunca vio conducir a una dama?. Lo adiviné.

translation.en: He thought the dog was driving. No. No.
translation.es: - Creyó que conducía el perro. - No.

translation.en: I wonder what little lady made these.
translation.es: Me pregunto qué doncella hizo estas.

translation.en: So I made them to look like the ones in our garden.
translation.es: Las hice como las de nuestro jardín.

translation.en: They're just as real as possible.
All right. Now, gentlemen, look. See, that's what you do with the cloth.
translation.es: Muy bien. Caballeros. Fíjense, así se usa el repasador.

translation.en: - It's really just for wine drips. - Ooh, you got that, boys?
translation.es: - Es para secar las gotas de vino. - ¿Escucharon?

translation.en: - Did Bronco ever eat here? - No, he did not.
Uh, back then we had herring at the saloon and a whole lot of alcohol.
translation.es: En esa época, comíamos arenque y bebíamos mucho en la taberna.

translation.en: I remember this one time, Bronco made this wager that he could jump any horse
translation.es: Una vez, Bronco apostó que podía hacer saltar cualquier caballo

translation.en: over the tables and chairs of the saloon piled up in the street.
translation.es: por sobre las mesas y sillas de la taberna apiladas en la calle.

translation.en: Well, we chose him a nag all right.
walked the horse up to the tables and chairs,
translation.es: llevó el caballo hasta las mesas y sillas,

translation.en: talking to him all the while,
stroking his big, ugly head while the horse sniffed.
translation.es: acariciando la cabezota fea del caballo que olfateaba.

translation.en: And then he swung on and rode him back and…
But to get a nag to jump… ain't heard of.
translation.es: Lograr que un caballo decrépito salte así es inaudito.

translation.en: What… I don't know what you're talking about.
Do you mind quietening? We're eating.
Shut that down, or I will!
translation.es: ¡Deje eso, o se lo hago dejar yo!

translation.en: Go on over. I'll settle up.
Shall I settle up now, Mrs. Gordon, or…
send the bill, and I'll post a check.
translation.es: mande la cuenta y le envío un cheque.

translation.en: ♪ Please, oh, please Oh, do not let me fall ♪
translation.es: Oh, por favor, no me dejes caer.

translation.en: ♪ You're all mine I love you best of all ♪
translation.es: Eres mía, te amo con todo mi ser.

translation.en: ♪ You must be my girl Or I'll have no girl at all ♪
translation.es: Debes ser mi chica o ninguna tendré.

translation.en: ♪ There'll be a hot time In the old town tonight ♪
translation.es: Habrá mucha diversión en el viejo pueblo esta noche.

translation.en: ♪ When you hear The bells a- dinglin' ♪
♪ All join 'round And sweetly you must sing… ♪
translation.es: Todos nos reuniremos, y con dulzura cantarás…

translation.en: Come over here. I love you.
What you said about her boy tonight, Phil…
translation.es: Lo que dijiste sobre su hijo esta noche, Phil…

translation.en: She had her ear to the door?
translation.es: ¿Tenía la oreja pegada a la puerta?

translation.en: I said her boy needed to snap out of it and get human.
translation.es: Dije que su hijo debía reaccionar y empezar a actuar normal.

translation.en: Is that how Bronco Henry learned it?
I never saw him out on a lunge, that's a fact.
translation.es: Nunca lo vi trabajar a la cuerda, la verdad.

translation.en: What is it you see up there, Phil?
Has anyone else seen what you've seen, Phil?
translation.es: ¿Alguien más vio lo que vio usted, Phil?

translation.en: Come on, Phil. What is it?
Not if you can't see it, there ain't.
I really just came to see you.
This most wholesome sauce is excellent

translation.es: para usar con carne, pescado y queso.

translation.en: I wish they wouldn't do that. I don't like drinking.
translation.es: Ojalá no hicieran eso. No me gusta el alcohol.

translation.en: I'd say they have more in them than wine. Sounds like booze.
translation.es: Diría que bebieron más que vino. Parece algo fuerte.

translation.en: They're early. I should have never put the pianola in there.
translation.es: Llegaron temprano. Nunca debí poner ahí la pianola.

translation.en: I see… I see the Herndon doctor and the undertaker, Mr. Weltz.
translation.es: Veo al médico de Herndon y al funebrero, el señor Weltz.

translation.en: Oh, goodness.  I wish Peter were here.
He should be serving the salad, and I need to fry the chicken.
translation.es: Él debería servir la ensalada, y yo tengo que freír el pollo.

translation.en: Sometimes if you get food on the table…
translation.es: A veces, si ven la comida en la mesa…

translation.en: I'm gonna run and get Peter.
- Uh, looks like I'm the new waiter. -
translation.es: Parece que soy el nuevo mesero.

translation.en: Run into any snow down below?
Well, I guess I'll roll me a smoke since I'm woke up.
translation.es: Ya que estoy despierto, me voy a armar un cigarrillo.

translation.en: Beech. That's where I aimed for.
Whatcha doin' down there, Georgie Boy?
I was speaking to Mrs. Gordon.

translation.es: La que te lloró en el hombro.

translation.en: Give her half a chance, and she'll be after some dollar for Miss Nancy's college fee.
translation.es: Si le das confianza, acabarás pagando la universidad del chico afeminado.

translation.en: Remember how the Old Lady brought those girls out to the ranch
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas que la Vieja trajo a esas chicas a la hacienda

translation.en: as soon as we could get hard- ons?
translation.es: apenas se nos empezó a parar?
¿Recuerdas a la reina de la sopa de tomate?

translation.en: Wasn't it her that wrote you,
translation.es: ¿No fue ella la que te escribió:

translation.en: I always will remember the western moon?
translation.es: Recordaré por siempre la luna del oeste?

translation.en: Well, guess you coulda taken her out
translation.es: A ella podrías haberla sacado a pasear

translation.en: without first putting a sack over her head.
translation.es: sin antes ponerle una bolsa en la cabeza.

translation.en: It's a piece of ass you're after, fatso,
I'm damn sure you can get it without a license.
translation.es: seguro lo puedes conseguir sin formalidades.

translation.en: What do you do with these?
Do you cut 'em up or something?

translation.es: con la viuda de un suicida

translation.en: A little desk for your big desk.
translation.es: Un escritorio pequeño para el grande.

translation.en: - - Did you write to the Old Lady?
Yeah, I dropped 'em both a line.
Did you say something about Rose?
Well, you know as well as I do what the Old Lady would feel
translation.es: Sabes tan bien como yo lo que sentiría la Vieja

translation.en: if she thought you were getting mixed up with her.
translation.es: si pensara que te estás enrollando con ella.

translation.en: The Old Lady would feel as one Mrs. Burbank would feel
translation.es: La Vieja pensaría lo mismo que piensa una señora Burbank

translation.en: She got rid of her property in Beech.
Stand steady, you little bitch, huh?
Look at me, you little bitch! Huh?  Yeah?
Quit it! You fat- faced bitch!
My school boarders eat dinner at 6:00 p.m. sharp.
translation.es: Los pupilos comen a las 6:00 p. m. en punto.

translation.en: No dish- washing duty if he has homework.
translation.es: No deberá lavar los platos si tiene tarea.

translation.en: Maybe you'd like to come to the ranch sometimes? Won't that be nice?
translation.es: Quizá desees ir a la hacienda de vez en cuando. ¿No sería lindo?

translation.en: May I keep some of these rose petals?
I've been thinking we should have some sort of dinner party
translation.es: Estuve pensando que deberíamos hacer una cena

translation.en: to introduce you to my parents.
And perhaps we could invite the governor and his wife too.
translation.es: Y tal vez también invitar al gobernador y su esposa.

translation.en: I saw them in Herndon today, and, uh,
translation.es: Hoy los vi en Herndon y…

translation.en: I… I kind of already mentioned it to them.
translation.es: Ya se los mencioné, más o menos.

translation.en: Uh, maybe you'd be kind enough to play something on our old piano.
translation.es: Quizá tendrías la gentileza de tocar algo en nuestro viejo piano.

translation.en: But, George, I'm not very good.
translation.es: Pero no soy muy buena, George.

translation.en: - I only played for the moving pictures. -
You are plenty fine enough for us.
translation.es: Tu talento es más que suficiente para nosotros.

translation.en: The Old Lady can't play a note, so…
translation.es: La Vieja no sabe tocar nada, así que…

translation.en: This looks like a good spot.
One, two, three. And to the side.
- To the side again. One, two… - Sorry, I… I really can't.
translation.es: - Otra vez al costado. Uno, dos… - Perdón, no sé.

translation.en: - I really can't dance. I…  - You're dancing.
translation.es: - No sé bailar. Yo… - Estás bailando.

translation.en: One, two, three. To the side.
translation.es: Uno, dos, tres. A un costado.

translation.en: I told you I'd teach you.
I wanted to say how nice it is
translation.es: Solo quería decir lo agradable que es

translation.en: Go on up and get out of the cold.
- Something wrong with the furnace? - Search me.
translation.es: - ¿Pasa algo con la caldera? - Ni idea.

translation.en: - I'll go down and shake it up. - I've been hanging around for you all day.
translation.es: - Iré a encenderla. - Te estuve esperando todo el día.

translation.en: There's a deed the Old Gent wants sent to him.
translation.es: El Viejo quiere que le enviemos una escritura.

translation.en: Well, I figure that can go till morning.
- You all right? - I'm perfectly fine, George.
we had such a nice trip--
We had such a nice trip.
This is the bathroom. Just make yourself at home.
translation.es: Este es el baño. Ponte cómoda.

translation.en: Now, you just make yourself comfortable.
Now, I'm going to bring you a surprise.
Well, then it won't be a surprise.
translation.es: Si te dijera, no sería sorpresa.

translation.en: When the rains come, the cellar gets flooded.
translation.es: Cuando llegan las lluvias, se inunda el sótano.

translation.en: So, the rats all drown. They float to the surface.
translation.es: Y las ratas se ahogan. Flotan hasta la superficie.

translation.en: I have to get the young lads in to scoop 'em all up with a…
translation.es: Tengo que hacer que los muchachos las saquen todas con un…

translation.en: - Turn it around that way. - Please, I'll take it.
translation.es: Gírenlo hacia allí. Por favor, démelo.

translation.en: - What is it? - Head to the front door.
- You got it? - Yeah, I got it.
- Whoa, hold it. - It's a Mason & Hamlin baby grand.
translation.es: Es un piano de cola mignon de Mason & Hamlin.

translation.en: Oh no, it's… it's too good for me. I'm…
translation.es: No, es demasiado bueno para mí. Soy…

translation.en: I'm just very average. I… I only know tunes.
translation.es: Soy apenas promedio. Solo sé melodías.

translation.en: We don't want a concert. We just wanna hear you play, Rose.
translation.es: No pretendemos un concierto. Solo queremos oírte tocar.

translation.en: - I should like to look on the governor… - Easy.
…as he drives up and gets out of his vehicle.
translation.es: cuando llegue y se baje del auto.

translation.en: - One step at a time, ready? - Two, three, four.
translation.es: - Un paso a la vez, ¿listo? - Dos, tres, cuatro.

translation.en: - You make a rope with these? - These strips? Yeah.
translation.es: - ¿Hará una soga con estas? - ¿Con estas tiras? Sí.

translation.en: You boys find something needs doing.
translation.es: Vayan a ocuparse en algo, muchachos.

translation.en: I just came over to speak about something.
Come on, partner. Open your talker. What is it?
His Nibs will be here for dinner and the Old Gent and the Old Lady.
translation.es: Su Señoría vendrá a cenar con el Viejo y la Vieja.

translation.en: Well, sir, ain't we going into society.
No, I… I like to hear Rose play.
translation.es: No, me gusta oír tocar a Rose.

translation.en: Well, old- timer, what is it? What's in the noodle?
- I just… - Go on, spit it out.
- Well, it's about His Nibs, the governor. - All right.
translation.es: - Es sobre Su Señoría, el gobernador. - Bien.

translation.en: Well, it's not so much about His Nibs
but His Nibs' wife, actually, uh…
translation.es: sino sobre su esposa, a decir verdad…

translation.en: I was thinking His Nibs probably wouldn't mind so much,
translation.es: Pensaba que a Su Señoría no le molestará tanto,
pero quizá a su mujer, sí.

translation.en: Well, it's sort of a hard thing…
She might mind if you come to the table without a washup.
translation.es: Quizá le moleste que te presentes sin asearte primero.
El auto está a la vuelta.
La servilleta va en forma de abanico, así…

translation.en: We may as well try and warm this place.
Use your hand. Use your hand like so.
You keep warm. I can bring them in.
translation.es: No tomes frío. Yo los hago entrar.

translation.en: Oh, how sweet. They have their own umbrella.
- Orange blossoms. - It's an island of civilization here.
translation.es: - Orange blossom. - Esta es una isla de civilización.

translation.en: I was, uh, telling Georgie about your brother.
translation.es: Le contaba a Georgie sobre su hermano.

translation.en: Phi Beta Kappa at Yale, wasn't it?
So, uh… he swears at the cattle in Greek or Latin?
translation.es: ¿Maldice al ganado en griego o latín?

translation.en: Uh, Rose plays the piano very well.
translation.es: Rose toca muy bien el piano.

translation.en: I'll just go have a look- see out the back for Phil.
translation.es: Echaré un vistazo a ver si encuentro a Phil.

translation.en: Oh, good. I want to meet this brother.
translation.es: Bien. Deseo conocer a ese hermano.

translation.en: I suppose there was some sort of an injury.  Oh, Edward, Georgina.
translation.es: - Hubo algún tipo de herida. - Edward, Georgina.

translation.en: Ah! Here are two people we can't fool.
translation.es: Dos personas que no podemos engañar.

translation.en: Oh no, you cannot. We know everything. We're walking encyclopedias.
translation.es: No. Nosotros lo sabemos todo. Somos enciclopedias andantes. Al menos, yo.

translation.en: At least I am. I have nothing to do but read.
translation.es: Somos enciclopedias andantes. Al menos, yo. Me dedico a leer.

translation.en: She's been reading The Curse of Tutankhamun in The Digest.
translation.es: Estuvo leyendo La maldición de Tutankamón en el Digest.

translation.en: So, uh, you believe in the curse?
Oh, no, no, I'm not drinking George's concoction.
translation.es: No quiero ese brebaje de George.

translation.en: Yes, I do. But did you know that Tutankhamun was just a boy?
translation.es: Sí. Pero ¿sabía usted que Tutankamón era solo un jovencito?

translation.en: Everyone's here. And we're just about to eat.
translation.es: Están todos aquí. Y ya vamos a comer.

translation.en: Yes, we're counting on your conversation.
translation.es: Sí, contamos con tus dotes de conversador.

translation.en: I shouldn't have said what I said to you about--
translation.es: No debí haber dicho lo que te dije de…

translation.en: You two can keep your apologies to yourself. I'm not coming.
translation.es: Guárdense sus disculpas, los dos. No pienso ir.

translation.en: The Old Lady wants to see you too. She's come a long way.
translation.es: La Vieja quiere verte a ti también. Viene de lejos.

translation.en: You can tell them the truth.
That I stink and I like it.
translation.es: Que apesto y que me gusta.

translation.en: Nothing could have happened to Phil, could it?
translation.es: No le habrá sucedido nada a Phil, ¿no?

translation.en: No, he'll be fine. Something just must've come up.
translation.es: No, estará bien. Debe haber surgido algo.

translation.en: are you going to play for us?
Yes, George told me you play very well.
translation.es: Sí, George me dijo que toca muy bien.

translation.en: - Oh no, I'm terribly out of practice. - Yes, we'd love that.
translation.es: - No, me falta práctica. - Sí, nos encantaría.

translation.en: Come now, you've been playing a lot. You know you have.
I don't know what to play.
- What one? - Why, the… the one about the Gypsy.
I… I can't seem to remember that one.
I… I played in a cinema pit for hours and hours.
translation.es: Tocaba en un teatro de cine durante horas y horas.

translation.en: Well, she got you halter trained, right, George? That's the main thing.
translation.es: Lo tiene dominado, ¿no, George? Eso es lo principal.

translation.en: No, it was a lovely, lovely evening. Thank you.
translation.es: No, ha sido una noche encantadora. Gracias.

translation.en: So, you weren't eaten by a cougar.
translation.es: Así que no lo devoró un puma.

translation.en: I am sorry to have missed your conversation.
translation.es: Lamento no haber podido platicar con usted.

translation.en: You're gonna want to keep your distance. I'm just off the horse.
translation.es: Mantenga la distancia. Acabo de desmontar.

translation.en: You've been listening to the pinano and dancing, I guess.
You sure did practice a terrible lot.
See, you wouldn't think there was much difference
translation.es: No veo que haya mucha diferencia

translation.en: between a cinema pit and a dinner party.
translation.es: entre un cine y una cena.

translation.en: I could hardly eat worrying about you.
translation.es: Me tenías preocupada. Casi no comí.

translation.en: I didn't get washed up, so I didn't come.
translation.es: No me aseé, así que no vine.

translation.en: Oh, he's a ranchman, isn't that right? That's honest dirt.
translation.es: Es ganadero, ¿verdad? Es suciedad bien ganada.

translation.en: I'll just run and grab you a blanket for the ride.
translation.es: Iré a traerle una manta para el viaje.

translation.en: I wondered if you didn't think about leaving your medical books here for the summer.
translation.es: Me preguntaba si no habías pensado dejar aquí tus libros por el verano.

translation.en: I thought about it, but… but you understand they were Dad's.
translation.es: Lo pensé, pero eran de papá.

translation.en: He calls me Doctor, and I call him Professor, 'cause that's what we wanna be.
translation.es: Nos tratamos de doctor y profesor, porque eso deseamos ser.

translation.en: Why don't you invite your friend to the ranch?
translation.es: ¿Y si lo invitas a la hacienda?

translation.en: I don't want him to meet a certain person.
translation.es: No quiero que conozca a cierta persona.

translation.en: How come you don't wear gloves?
Castrate 1,500 head, then nick your thumb on the last.
translation.es: Capas 1500 cabezas y te cortas el pulgar en la última.

translation.en: Well, fatso, I think we're finished.
You're gonna see him creeping all over the place now.
translation.es: Ahora vamos a verlo reptando seguido por aquí.
Cuiden sus fogatas. Viene el verano.

translation.en: Which also means any Indians camping need to be moved off the property.
translation.es: Echen de la propiedad a todo indio que decida acampar aquí.

translation.en: - We got animals they want to eat. Got it? -
translation.es: Tenemos animales que ellos quieren comer. ¿Entendido?

translation.en: Keep your eyes and ears open.
Maybe find yourselves an arrowhead up by them aspens.
translation.es: Pueden encontrar puntas de flecha junto a esos álamos.
Esta noche no bajaré a cenar.

translation.en: It's George's week in town, so it's just Phil.
translation.es: Es la semana que George pasa en el pueblo, así que solo está Phil.

translation.en: Oh no. It's… it's not a snake, is it?
Come here. Come here. Come here.
You can eat in your room.
They dug up that graveyard to make way for the new highway.
translation.es: Excavaron en ese cementerio para construir la nueva carretera.

translation.en: Among those buried there was a friend of mine.
translation.es: Entre los enterrados ahí, había una amiga mía.

translation.en: A clumsy tractor driver broke open the coffin,
translation.es: Al torpe que conducía el tractor se le abrió el ataúd,

translation.en: and they found her hair had continued to grow after her death.
translation.es: y vieron que el cabello le había seguido creciendo.

translation.en: The whole coffin just stuffed with her lovely golden hair.
translation.es: Todo el ataúd estaba lleno de su hermoso cabello dorado.

translation.en: Except for a few feet from the end,
translation.es: Salvo unos pocos metros del final,

translation.en: - Some say she was a beauty. - What?
Golden braids on top of her hair.
translation.es: Tenía trenzas doradas en la parte de arriba.

translation.en: Oh! Yes, go and see. It's very sweet.
translation.es: Sí, ve. Es muy dulce de tu parte.

translation.en: - No, please. Get out of my room. - Where's your rabbit?
translation.es: - No, por favor. Vete. - ¿Y tu conejo?

translation.en: Now, even if you're happy being in your room all day,
translation.es: Aunque te encante pasar el día en tu cuarto,

translation.en: - Mom, I have a lot to do. - Come on.
But if I want to be a surgeon, I have to practice.
translation.es: Pero para ser cirujano, necesito practicar.

translation.en: Well, you're not to kill them in the house, Peter.
translation.es: No quiero que los mates en la casa, Peter.

translation.en: No, I'm putting my foot down.
translation.es: No. Te lo digo en serio.

translation.en: Oh, where'd a man be if he always did what his mother told him?
translation.es: Pobre del hombre que jamás desobedece a su madre.

translation.en: I know, Lola. You don't have to…
You don't have to narrate it. I'll just… remember.
translation.es: No tienes que relatar. Lo recordaré.

translation.en: - Whoo! - Yeah, that was definitely out.
Lola, can you please take over? I have a migraine.
translation.es: Lola, ¿puedes tomar mi lugar? Tengo migraña.

translation.en: - Where do you want me? - Back there.
- I hit that way. - I was aiming for you.
I feel like my eyes are going to pop out of my head.
translation.es: Siento que los ojos se me saldrán de la cara.

translation.en: He's just a man, Peter, only another man.
translation.es: Es un hombre como cualquier otro, Peter.

translation.en: Yeah? You want 'em off, do you?
Get out of here, you little bitch! You hear me?
♪ Let the snow melt off Wash away my sorrow ♪
translation.es: Derrite la nieve y borra mi dolor.
esa luna de miel en mí.

translation.en: ♪ I said, Oh, Lord, oh, Lord ♪ ♪ Oh, Lord, oh, Lord ♪
♪ I said, Oh, Daddy, oh, Daddy Oh, Daddy, oh ♪
♪ I said, Oh, Daddy, oh, Daddy Oh, Daddy, oh ♪
No one tell him to soak those jeans?
translation.es: ¿Nadie le dijo que lavara ese pantalón?

translation.en: Well, I don't see any Mr. Burbank here.
translation.es: No veo a ningún Sr. Burbank aquí.

translation.en: I guess it's hard for a young'un like you to call an old fella like me
translation.es: A un joven como tú debe costarle llamar Phil a un viejo como yo, al principio.
llamar Phil a un viejo como yo, al principio.

translation.en: Now come and take a look at this.
Have you done any braiding or plaiting yourself, Pete?
Peter, we kind of got off on the wrong foot.
translation.es: Peter, nosotros comenzamos con el pie izquierdo.

translation.en: - Did we, sir? - Forget the sir stuff.
People who get to be good friends.
translation.es: Y luego se convierten en grandes amigos.

translation.en: Now, you see? You did it.
I'm gonna finish this rope and give it to you and teach you how to use it.
translation.es: Terminaré esta soga, te la regalaré y te enseñaré a usarla.

translation.en: Sort of a lonesome place out here, Pete.
translation.es: Aquí puedes sentirte muy solo, Pete.

translation.en: Unless you get in the swing of things.
translation.es: A menos que le tomes el ritmo.

translation.en: How long do you expect it would take to finish that rope?
translation.es: ¿Cuánto cree que llevará terminar la soga?

translation.en: I could get it finished before you go back to school.
translation.es: Podría terminarla antes de que vuelvas a estudiar.

translation.en: It won't be very long then, Phil.
You can sit on it, Pete.
Don't let your mom make a sissy of you.
translation.es: No dejes que tu mamá te haga afeminado.

translation.en: you're soaking up all the riding know- how you'll ever need and then some.
translation.es: aprenderás todo lo que necesitas saber sobre montar, y más.

translation.en: That saddle belonged to Bronco Henry.
translation.es: Esa montura era de Bronco Henry.

translation.en: There's a cliff way out back of the ranch with initials and 1805 carved into it.
translation.es: En un acantilado al fondo de la hacienda, hay unas iniciales y el año 1805 grabados.

translation.en: Must have been some fella from the Lewis and Clark Expedition.
translation.es: Debió ser alguien de la expedición de Lewis y Clark.

translation.en: They were real men in those days.
Let's say just you and me go out for a couple of days.
translation.es: Podríamos salir solos por un par de días.

translation.en: Find those trails and follow them to the end.
translation.es: Seguir aquellos senderos hasta el final.

translation.en: Wouldn't be surprised if there were gold
translation.es: No me sorprendería si hubiera oro

translation.en: or precious minerals in them there rocks.
translation.es: o minerales preciosos en esas rocas.

translation.en: Do many of the calves die from wolves?
There's always a few that get… tore up or hamstrung or die of anthrax.
translation.es: Siempre a unos pocos los devoran, caen con tendones cortados o con ántrax.

translation.en: You know, you talk like a Victrola record. You know that?
- Did Bronco Henry teach you to ride, Phil? - Yep.
translation.es: - ¿Bronco Henry te enseñó a montar, Phil? - Sí.

translation.en: He taught me to use my eyes in ways that other people can't.
translation.es: Me enseñó a usar la vista de modos que otros no saben.

translation.en: Most people look at it and just see a hill.
translation.es: La mayoría la mira y ve solo una colina.

translation.en: Where Bronco looked at it, what do you suppose he saw?
translation.es: Cuando la miraba Bronco, ¿qué crees que veía?

translation.en: - The hell, you just saw that now? - No.
translation.es: - Diablos. ¿Lo viste así de rápido ahora? - No.

translation.en: See, it looks like a dog with its jaw wide open.
translation.es: Parece un perro con la mandíbula bien abierta.

translation.en: Can't you come in and talk for a little?
You've gotten to be quite friendly with Phil, haven't you?
translation.es: Te has hecho muy amigo de Phil, ¿verdad?

translation.en: He's making a rope for me.
Peter, I wish you wouldn't make that sound with your comb.
translation.es: Peter, por favor, no hagas eso con el peine.

translation.en: I felt a chill in my spine when I heard the chalk squeak on a blackboard.
translation.es: se me erizaban los pelos de la nuca con el chirrido de la tiza en la pizarra.

translation.en: Oh, Miss…  Mrs. Merchant, that's who it was.
She… she drew chalk stars by our names on the blackboard.
translation.es: Dibujaba estrellas de tiza junto a nuestros nombres en la pizarra.

translation.en: I wonder why it was stars she gave us.
Why not diamonds? Why not hearts?
I wonder why it was always stars.
translation.es: Quién sabe por qué siempre estrellas.

translation.en: Because stars are supposed to be unreachable.
But they weren't unreachable because she gave them to us.
translation.es: Pero no eran inalcanzables porque nos las daba.

translation.en: We had this valentine box, and it was covered with white crepe paper.
translation.es: Teníamos una caja de San Valentín cubierta con papel crêpe blanco.

translation.en: And we would paste big, red hearts on it.
translation.es: Y le pegábamos encima grandes corazones rojos.

translation.en: And you had a great many valentines.
Is there a sound that makes you shiver?
Mother, you don't have to do this.
translation.es: Mamá, no tienes que hacer esto.

translation.en: I'll see you don't have to do it.
translation.es: Me encargaré de que no tengas que hacerlo.

translation.en: - This his first week? - Nope, third.
translation.es: - ¿Es su primera semana? - No, la tercera.

translation.en: Open up the gate. Let him out.
- You sure? He's not ready. - Go on. Let him out.
translation.es: - ¿Sí? No está listo. - Abre. Que salga.

translation.en: - What you doing? - Going to give him a hand.
- Let him figure it out. - Oh, oh!
Fall off, you get back on.
Any happenings while I was away?
Where are you two off to?
Rose? Can't Peter go with you today?
Well, he could, but him and Phil have kinda paired up.
translation.es: Podría, pero Phil y él se han hecho compinches.

translation.en: - I don't want him to be with Phil at all. - But, Rose…
translation.es: - No quiero que esté un minuto con Phil. - Pero, Rose…

translation.en: He's helping him. He taught him how to ride.
translation.es: Lo está ayudando. Le enseñó a montar.

translation.en: You know who started riding as late as you?
translation.es: ¿Sabes quién empezó a montar tan tarde como tú?

translation.en: Hadn't done any of it till he was about your age now.
translation.es: No cabalgó hasta que tuvo tu edad.

translation.en: Hey, Peter, let's see how long it takes
before Mr. Cottontail makes a run for the open.
translation.es: en salir corriendo Colita de algodón.

translation.en: Now, as kids, we used to take bets…
before the animals ran out and made a run for it.
translation.es: antes de que los animales salieran corriendo.

translation.en: I guess he has to be gutsy.
Well, put him out of his misery.
You got a tan. That's a cowboy tan you got.
a man was made by patience and the odds against him.
translation.es: que la paciencia ante la adversidad nos hace hombres.

translation.en: And you had to try and remove them.
Well, you've certainly got obstacles. That's a fact, Pete, me boy.
translation.es: Tú ciertamente tienes obstáculos. Eso es innegable, querido Pete.

translation.en: I guess you know she's been half- shot all summer. Yeah, I know.
translation.es: - Habrás notado que pasó el verano ebria. - Sí, lo sé.

translation.en: - She never did. - But your pa, Pete?
I guess he hit the bottle pretty hard?
translation.es: Supongo que se aferraba a la botella.

translation.en: Until right at the very end.
He used to worry I wasn't kind enough.
translation.es: Creía que yo era poco amable.

translation.en: Things will work out for you yet.
They were standing right in front of the damn things asking,
translation.es: Estaban parados frente a las malditas cosas preguntando

translation.en: Do we have any hides? Are they leaving?
translation.es: Y si teníamos cueros. ¿Se están yendo?

translation.en: Yes, they've got their horse going.
translation.es: Sí, ahí van con el caballo.

translation.en: I told them the hides are gonna be burned.
translation.es: Les dije que quemaríamos los cueros.

translation.en: Why are the hides going to be burned?
translation.es: ¿Por qué vamos a quemar los cueros?

translation.en: Phil doesn't want anyone else to have 'em.
translation.es: Phil no quiere dárselos a nadie.

translation.en: Waits till there's a big pile and sets fire to the lot.
translation.es: Espera a que se forme una pila y les prende fuego.

translation.en: He'd blow up if they even touched 'em.
translation.es: Se enfurecería si los tocaran siquiera.

translation.en: It would be my honor if you would take them.
translation.es: Sería un honor para mí regalárselos.

translation.en: - You all right, ma'am? - Is she breathing?
Oh, she really put her foot into it this time.
translation.es: Esta vez ella sí que metió la pata.

translation.en: - Or maybe even gave them away. - Why? Why?
Why would she do that, Phil? She knew that we needed the hides.
translation.es: ¿Por qué lo haría? Sabía que los necesitábamos.

translation.en: I'd think you'd know from the books your pa left you that your ma's got a… a whatchamacallit.
translation.es: Deberías saber, por los libros de tu papá, que tu mamá tiene… ¿Cómo se dice?

translation.en: Alcoholic personality. It comes under the letter A!
translation.es: Una personalidad alcohólica. ¡Está en la letra A!

translation.en: - You're not gonna say anything to her? - Say anything?
But sure as one good hell, brother George is going to.
translation.es: pero, demonios, mi hermano George seguro que sí.

translation.en: It is high time that that bozo and you got next to a few…
translation.es: Es hora de que tú y esa estúpida enfrenten algunos…

translation.en: What do you ever call them? Facts!
She stashes alcohol all around the place, even drinking in the stinking alley.
translation.es: Esconde botellas por toda la casa. Hasta bebe en el callejón apestoso.

translation.en: Look at your face in the mirror!
Is it that she could like? Or our money? Wake the hell up!
The hides were only going to be burned.
I've got rawhide to finish the rope.
translation.es: Tengo tiento para terminar la soga.

translation.en: You've got it? What are you doing with rawhide?
I wanted to be like you.
That's damn kind of you, Pete.
translation.es: Es muy amable de tu parte, Pete.

translation.en: Everything's gonna be plain sailing for you from now on in.
translation.es: A partir de ahora, todo irá viento en popa para ti.

translation.en: How old were you when you met Bronco Henry?
translation.es: ¿A qué edad conociste a Bronco Henry?

translation.en: About the age you are now.
translation.es: Más o menos, a la tuya.
Una vez me salvó la vida.

translation.en: We were way off up in the hills shooting elk, and the weather turned mean.
translation.es: Estábamos en las colinas cazando ciervos, y el clima se puso feo.

translation.en: Bronco kept me alive by… lying body against body in a bedroll.
translation.es: Para mantenerme vivo, Bronco se acostó conmigo en un saco de dormir.

translation.en: Fell off to sleep that way.
- Phil left already? - No, he's not here.
translation.es: - ¿Phil se fue ya? - No. Aquí no está.

translation.en: He say he was settin' out early?  No.
He's not been down at all.
I'll run you into Herndon to see the doctor.
translation.es: Iremos a Herndon a ver a un médico.

translation.en: Phil… what happened to your hand?
translation.es: Phil, ¿qué te pasó en la mano?

translation.en: Rose would like you to join us for Christmas, if you care to.
translation.es: Rose los invita a acompañarnos en Navidad, si así lo desean.

translation.en: I'll know in a day or two when the results come back.
translation.es: Tendré los resultados en uno o dos días.

translation.en: But he never handled diseased animals. He was particular on that.
translation.es: Pero él nunca tocaba animales enfermos. Era muy cuidadoso con eso.

translation.en: Deliver my soul from the sword, my darling from the power of the dog.
translation.es: Libra de la espada mi alma. Mi vida, del poder del perro.
